hiveArticle.title: Again a Beautiful Sunset
hiveArticle.body:
This was around 6 PM when the sun was about to set with clouds all over the sky. Two pictures with two angles. 

![IMG_20180227_180603.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVLhZjvTQp39cpJk8Ez75bx7RTUsQdfvjYcbNrKo82SYD/IMG_20180227_180603.jpg)

![IMG_20180227_180519.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmfWjEBqTumdSsxQH4FgLgJm5nK8seEZbn5xtmwo4dcHgX/IMG_20180227_180519.jpg)

The below pictures are taken at 6:30 PM when the sun was set but the clouds exist and orange in color

![IMG_20180227_183337.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRC96E5kqj9FGRDuNN9tHPzyWUR7fxXzGpzWfF1tEmNwG/IMG_20180227_183337.jpg)

![IMG_20180227_183233.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRu7mPaHBsjpoK4p9QsYLmiUHoaXRqTio3S97WZBSxqju/IMG_20180227_183233.jpg)

### Camera : Nokia 6
